Question: Kotonlink (Shen Zhen) Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kotonlink (Shen Zhen) Technology Co., Ltd

Smart Lock

- Product lines include smart door lock, smart deadbolt lock, smart padlock, and cabinet lock
- Supports TUYA and TTLock app
- Custom hardware and firmware options available
- Introduces KT-BBA53 smart door lock with dual unlocking methods, 3D facial recognition, electronic peephole, fingerprint technology, contactless access options, voice intercom, rechargeable battery, durable design, and universal compatibility

GPS Tracker

- Offers personal tracking, vehicle tracking, asset tracking, and pet/animal tracker

Wireless Router

- Includes 4G/5G MiFi/CPE, IoT router, WiFi mesh, and industrial gateway
- Provides IoT solutions for personnel management, logistic transport management, livestock management, smart home solutions, and pet location solution

Company Overview

- Founded in 2017, specializing in electronic OEM manufacturing services
- Expertise in smart hardware, IoT, and LPWAN asset tracking
- Offers hardware design, firmware & software development, and cloud management platform
- Trusted IoT partner with global clientele
Summary_cn:
科通链（深圳）科技有限公司

智能锁

- 产品系列包括智能门锁、智能死锁、智能挂锁和柜锁
- 支持TUYA和TTLock应用程序
- 提供定制硬件和固件选项
- 推出KT-BBA53智能门锁，具有双重解锁方法、3D人脸识别、电子瞄孔、指纹技术、无接触访问选项、语音对讲、可充电电池、耐用设计和通用兼容性

GPS追踪器

- 提供个人追踪、车辆追踪、资产追踪和宠物/动物追踪

无线路由器

- 包括4G/5G MiFi/CPE、物联网路由器、WiFi Mesh和工业网关
- 提供人员管理、物流运输管理、牲畜管理、智能家居解决方案和宠物定位解决方案的物联网解决方案

公司概述

- 成立于2017年，专业从事电子OEM制造服务
- 在智能硬件、物联网和LPWAN资产追踪领域拥有专业知识
- 提供硬件设计、固件和软件开发以及云管理平台
- 是全球客户信赖的物联网合作伙伴
